#summary average(property[distinct,where,include])
#labels api,0.8,model,class

*Description*:

Calculates the average value for a given property. Uses the SQL function AVG.

*Return Type*:

Numeric

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true ||  || Name of the property to calculate the average for. ||
|| *distinct* || boolean || false || false || When true, AVG will be performed only on each unique instance of a value, regardless of how many times the value occurs. ||
|| *where* || string || false ||  || A SQL fragment such as lastName LIKE 'A%' for example. ||
|| *include* || string || false ||  || Any associations that needs to be included in the query. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset avgSalary = model("Employee").average("salary")>

}}}

 * ColumnStatistics (chapter)
